snippet: Thousands of runners were determined that the cancellation of the marathon would not keep them from completing the 26.2-mile course through New York City on Sunday.
abstract: Few dozen marathoners run through four of New York City’s five boroughs, improvising route as needed, determined that cancellation of marathon after Hurricane Sandy would not keep them from completing an unofficial race.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of runners were determined that the cancellation of the marathon would not keep them from completing the 26.2-mile course through New York City on Sunday.

headline.seo: Tranquillity, Not Cheers or Hordes, Line New York City Marathon Route
headline.main: Along the 26.2 Miles, No Hordes or Cheers, Just Odd Tranquillity
headline.print_headline: Stepping Out... Along the 26.2 Miles, No Hordes or Cheers, Just Odd Tranquillity
